title: MRW someone says "Riot fucked this season, I'm leaving LoL" for the 27189th time....

replies.body:
Where did you find the smile that you edited on?
https://i.imgflip.com/1z52cg.jpg
'cuz this is the original and I'm genuinely curious

From this:
https://pm1.narvii.com/6491/d610e22a7b83d8f1ff535e6e8cb3f219d6c05e36_hq.jpg
don't worry my reindhart+10 can one shot hectors.
You are a disgusting human being and the reason I have a 42 res Deirdre with Quick Riposte.

Thank you. 
Ike says hi.
+3 Kagero with 47 attack and Death Blow says hello.
I um raise you a hector?

Welcome to Arvis town!

Alternatively, get ready for Tiki.
we don't need The Reinhardt here of all places zzzz
they did leave, for 30 minutes that is.

I actually know someone who quit league.

Granted, took the guys wife and kids telling him he needed to stop because it was ruining his life, but hey, he still did it.

Most impressive accomplishment I have ever seen tbh.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyPanda12,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=OKHGfKFj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-10T17:09:18.002+0000)
>
> I actually know someone who quit league.
> 
> Granted, took the guys wife and kids telling him he needed to stop because it was ruining his life, but hey, he still did it.
> 
> Most impressive accomplishment I have ever seen tbh.

Well if you have a wife and kids, then u kinda have to quit gaming, you can maybe casually play, but definatly not for like 6 hours a day. :^)
A lot of people do leave, they're just silent when they do. They don't announce it, that's just being a point whore.

I quit after the first day, I wish more people would do the same.  Riot can't go against [Tencents](https://www.polygon.com/2015/12/16/10326320/riot-games-now-owned-entirely-by-tencent) orders, but if there's a significant drop in players they'd have to reconsider, just look at [World of Warcraft after the Warlords of Draenor expansion.](https://www.forbes.com/sites/insertcoin/2015/08/05/world-of-warcraft-has-lost-44-of-its-subscribers-in-six-months-but-thats-okay/#26a4aa4527f6)

The truth :P I quit several months ago and i didn't go on a mini rant about why i did. Why would i need attention on a game i don't play any more? 

Wait. Does this technically count...? P.S. Yes. i DID quit the game and i'm using the Boards. I still love the LoL Community and Lore. Just....not anything else.
This is mildly terrifying...
Tbh league is like smoking, It's fucking cancer but it's hard to quit
It's like you read my college essay on League

i have gone on a very very long break before, basically i had quit the game and came back, but that was really just because i didnt need it distracting me from stuff in my life that i had to deal with and also i was salty at i think the shen rework, i cant even remember.  he was my favorite top laner for a while and i was a big fan of his old kit aside from the weirdly narrow e hitbox.  anyways though yeah most of the time when people say theyre quitting over XYZ reason in my experience it means "im not gonna play for like 2 months"
Xayah finally looks normal.

I got sucked into reading some of the leveling system complaints and just had to stop myself from typing anything -_-
{{sticker:sg-lulu}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}

Don't worry, I thought I would leave League when Riot pulled this massive overhaul...

Sadly, my love for League as a game still keeps me here...
I have uninstalled at least 10 times.  Longest I have made it was about 8 weeks I think.
25 % cdr from runes now gone.... certain people are mad

> [{quoted}](name=fReAkThEzOiD,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=OKHGfKFj,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-11-10T19:37:43.195+0000)
>
> 25 % cdr from runes now gone.... certain people are mad

well more than enough compensation from items and a fair amount of cdr in new runes.  honestly considering the oversaturation of cdr in items (aside from mage items ofc ironically) im surprised that anybody would ever take full cdr runes
When Rakan makes his Grand Entrance.

trust me many people may not actually quit the game complete but they sure dont play till riot fix that mess...

How i know that? times where the servers were almost full now you need 5 minutes to find a game...

Possition in Queue? yeah i havent see that message since the preseason...

The preseaon its bad even riot agree and they would try to fix it...but the problem is not the "new" chaos 

Is that supports are still broken ADC are still BROKEN and on top of that we add even more snowball DAMAGE so when the enemy ADC have 1-2 kills early the game is over right there

Tanks runes are useless and so on...

So yeah that why people going away not because of the preseason but because even in preseason the retarded bot meta its still the meta and it get stronger

>Possition in Queue? yeah i havent see that message since the preseason...

I'm seeing that literally every time I try to log in, even when servers are down.
It's been like that since one of patches around summer.

Nice bug checking on Riot's part.

Most people only come back because of their friends pick up lol or they hope the games state will get better.

Also how many people do you know quit the game and have come back? Do you keep a record of all the players that make quitting threads?

I've honestly never seen anyone come back to lol.

If someone did I'd imagine they are doing so in between game releases. I bet the holiday season ins't the best time for Riot Games since so many new things will be coming out drawing away attention.

Well the board isn't exactly 10 people, BeatzBoys. I'd say at least half of the 27189 people who say they are quitting didn't but I'm sure a lot of them did. Almost everyone in my friend list hasn't logged in for at least a year now, and some of them did they were going to quit. It's not like we're seeing the same bobjoe username pretending to quit once a week, these are different accounts. Maybe it's that kind of 'haha! you'll be back no matter what they/we do to the game!' thinking is why people are so tilted these days.

I really want to quit league...but I've invested so much time and money (about 1k...) into this game that throwing my account away is no longer an option. I'm here to see it through but that doesn't mean I'll like it.

When will people learn?

You don't quit league, league quits you
I too use facebook
Rakan hit her with a crit cast of the shocker. :3c
